PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 In this study , PQCDTB has been successfully synthesized through the Suzuki coupling reaction by introducing planar quinacridone unit and a broad - absorption benzothiadiazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Planar quinacridone unit
2. Broad-absorption benzothiadiazole unit

These are the two entities that describe the properties of the material being synthesized, PQCDTB. The planar quinacridone unit refers to the flat, planar structure of the quinacridone molecule, while the broad-absorption benzothiadiazole unit refers to the ability of the benzothiadiazole molecule to absorb a broad range of wavelengths.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the updated "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

1. Broad-absorption benzothiadiazole unit

The planar quinacridone unit does not clearly refer to a material property, so it has been removed. The broad-absorption benzothiadiazole unit, on the other hand, clearly refers to the absorption properties of the material, making it a relevant "Property Value" entity.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
